```{r}
library(matrixStats)
sds <- colSds(x)
qplot(sds, bins = 256, color = I(“black”))

library(caret)
nzv <- nearZeroVar(x)
image(matrix(1:784 %in% nzv, 28, 28))

col_index <- setdiff(1:ncol(x), nzv)
length(col_index)
```
